utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, remember when I had a monkey?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, what, what was I thinking?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! So, what’s with the 20 percent tip? Did I do something wrong?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Twenty percent is a pretty generous tip Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know what’s more generous than that?! Fifty percent! Y’know what’s even more generous than that?!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I see where you’re goin’!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s up with the greed Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, look I’m sorry you guys, but it’s just that I gotta get these new head shots made. And they’re really expensive, y’know? I’m down to like three! Well, actually two ‘cause one of ‘em I kinda blackened in some teeth—Why did I do that?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well isn’t there something you can do to earn a little extra money? I mean, can’t-can’t you pick up, I don’t know, an extra shift here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or, y’know, I used to beg for money. Of course it helps if you’ve got y’know a little of this goin’ on. Wow! I still have it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, wait! Wait! Don’t you have an audition today? Yeah! Maybe you’ll get that job!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, ha-ha-ha! Ooh! Wait a minute, I used to get medical experiments down on me all the time!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah, finally an explanation.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no! I used to get paid for all kinds of medical stuff, remember? Let’s see uh, well I don’t want to donate sperm again. I really prefer doing that at the home office y’know? Ooh-ooh, maybe they want like some of my blood or-or spit or something, huh?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: What did I tell you about talking to your friends while you’re working?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh do it?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: That guy has been waiting for his coffee for ten minutes! He’s complained about you three times!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, where was I?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what have you guys been up to?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh! We went to a self-defense class today!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, kicking a guy in the crotch all morning really takes it out of ya!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Takes it out of you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now, we can kick anybody’s ass!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: After one class? I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? You wanna see me self-defend myself?! Go over there and pretend you’re a sexual predator! Go on! I dare ya!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, of course you can defend yourself from an attack you know is coming, that’s not enough. Look, I studying kara-tay for a long time, and there’s a concept you should really be familiar with. It’s what the Japanese call unagi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Isn’t that a kind of sushi?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, it’s a concept!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah it is! It is! It’s freshwater eel!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, maybe it means that too…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! I would kill for a salmon skin roll right now!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? Fine! Get attacked! I don’t even care!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on Ross. We’re sorry. Please tell us what it is.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Unagi is a state of total awareness. Okay? Only by achieving true unagi can you be prepared for any danger that may befall you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You mean in case someone is trying to steal your bamboo sleeping mat or your kettle of fish?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All I’m saying is, it’s one thing being prepared for an attack against like each other; whole another story being prepared for an attack, I don’t know, like a surprise!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, you know that one was coming, but that doesn’t mean you have unagi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh! Y’know what? If we made reservations, we could have unagi in about a half-hour.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey-hey, is Monica here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, look I need your help, I don’t know what to get her for Valentine’s Day.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, Valentine’s Day was like two weeks ago, so I wouldn’t get her a calendar!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She was working on Valentine’s Day so we’re celebrating it tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh, hey! Why don’t you book a date for both of you at one of those romantic spas?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, Joey, that’s actually a really good idea!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And of course, crotchless panties.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well appealing as that does sound to her boyfriend and her brother, I can’t do that we promised we’d make each other gifts this year.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aw, I love that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You can’t make crotchless panties? You take, you take a pair of scissors and you just cut…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay-okay-okay! So, making things. That sounds like so much fun.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I thought so to until I paper mached one of my eyes shut.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I love paper mache! What did you make?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I made a…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What is that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So what are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, have you guys made anything that maybe I can take credit for?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh! I have! I have! I started making these little sock bunnies! Oh for crying out loud!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, wait a minute! That is my sock!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now, it’s you little bunny friend.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This, this actually is a…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Honey, can I ask you a question about the Valentine’s Day gifts?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do we have to make the entire thing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! Why, did you—you forget to make yours?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Of course, of course not. I just have to uh, go over to the place where I-I made it and pick-pick it up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, I can’t wait! This is going to be the best Valentine’s Day ever! I can’t believe it! Make the presents! Make the presents!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m just so excited to make the presents! Shoot!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi uh, I’m Joey Tribbiani and with all do respect I’d like to donate some fluids.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: We’re actually at the end of one of our research cycles, so we’re not looking for applicants right now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh that’s too bad. I’ve kinda been saving up. Uh, are you sure there’s no studies I can participate in?

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Well, here’s a schedule of what’s coming up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks. Well but this one starts now.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Oh that one is available now, but only identical twins are eligible. It’s a twins study.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But it’s $2,000.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well how about this one? Testing the effects of Joey Tribbiani on attractive nurse receptionists.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: We already got the results back on that on, and they’re not good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: DANGER!!! DANGER!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What the hell was that?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A lesson in the importance of unagi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, you’re a freak!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Perhaps. Now I’m curious, at what point during those girlish screams would you have begun to kick my ass?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, so we weren’t prepared!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry I had to take such drastic measures to make my point, but I—look, I just want you guys to be safe. DANGER!!!!! Ahhh, huh? Unagi.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: 2,000 bucks is a lot of money. Oh, I wish I had a twin. Where could I find someone who looks exactly like me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler. I sensed it was you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Unagi. I’m always aware.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, are you aware unagi is an eel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t figure out what to make Monica.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, why don’t you make her one of your little jokes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m going crazy! Okay? Do you have any thing around here that looks homemade?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? She’d-she’d love this. Uh, it’s an exact replica of Apollo 8. I made it in the sixth grade.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess I could use that. I could say that your love sends me to the moon.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, except Apollo 8 didn’t actually land on the moon. But you-you-you could write that umm, your love lets me orbit the moon twice and return safely.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait a minute, I can’t give this to her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because it says "Captain Ross" on the side and "I hate Monica" on the bottom.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: DANGER!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ahhhhh, salmon skin roll.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Yes honey, I made it myself. I can’t do it. I can’t do it. Oh! Oh! A mixed tape! A mixed tape!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Hi! You uh, ready to exchange gifts?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure! Okay, you go first.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, come here! Come here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now, it’s not wrapped because I just, just finished it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But I made you a tape of what I think are all romantic songs.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, what a great gift! Is The Way You Look Tonight on it?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe we’ll have to listen and see!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I love it! Thank you so much!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, you ready to open yours?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s a sock bunny.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, you remember how I call you bunny?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not really.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I did one time, and-and I want to start doing it more. See that’s what this is about.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I see. Y’know umm, Phoebe makes sock bunnies.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! No, she doesn’t. Uh Phoebe, what she makes—that’s uh—they’re sock rabbits. They are completely different—Okay! Okay! Okay! I didn’t make it! I’m sorry! I totally forgot about tonight and the fact that we’re supposed to make the presents!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, it’s okay. I don’t…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No-no, it’s not okay! It’s not! I mean you were just… You’re so incredible! You went through all this time and effort to make this tape for me! Y’know I’m just gonna—I, I am gonna make this up to you! I will! I-I am going to cook anything you want in here , and I am going to do anything you want in there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I did put a lot of thought in the tape.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! You are way to young to have seen that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oops! Y’know, your birthday is in a month-and-a-half, what do you say I forget to get you a present for that too?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You are totally and completely 100% forgiven.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We have got to wash that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you remember that jacket that you love so much, that you thought was too expensive?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You have done enough!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wanna wake up early and go get it for you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No you don’t—get it in black, not brown.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oop, your cake is ready!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oop!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it’s like that old saying, have some sex, eat some cake.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who the hell are you?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No! No! No! No! How you doin’?! How you doin’—Damnit Carl! Go wait in the hall!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I got to apologize on the behalf of Carl.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who the hell is Carl?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, did I not mention? Carl is a guy I hired to be my identical twin for a medical research project.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know sometimes the good ideas are just right in front of you, aren’t they?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, I know it sounds crazy, but I think it might work. Y’know? The only problem is, Carl’s acting is…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The only problem!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, he’s the reason I didn’t get that big Minute Maid commercial a couple of years ago remember? We were supposed to be brothers, but he messed it up.

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: Hey, uh can I get a little piece of that cake?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pizza!! We like Pizza!! Get out!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Pat Sajak?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yep!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alex Trebek?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, of course!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Chuck Woolery?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Definitely! Phoebe, you will not find a single game show host, who’s ass I cannot kick.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Say it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Say we are unagi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s not something you are! It’s something you have!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Say it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? I can easily get out of this, but there is a chance you can get very, very hurt!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right Carl, we’re next. Now remember, what is not gonna be?

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: Another Minute Maid fiasco.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s right! And what are you not gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Carl
utterance.content: Well, I’m not gonna talk because…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damnit Carl!

utterance.speaker: The Doctor
utterance.content: Can I have the next one please? Joey and Tony Tribbiani.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s us.

utterance.speaker: The Doctor
utterance.content: But uh, this is a study for identical twins.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s right, $2,000.

utterance.speaker: The Doctor
utterance.content: But, you’re not identical twins.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damnit Carl!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my good God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Continuing the countdown of your favorite meals. Tonight, No. 3, macaroni and cheese with cut up hot dogs.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, you have done enough! Okay? You have to stop this now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I will! But not tonight. For dinner music, I thought we could listen to that tape you made me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, the mixed tape.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The Way You Look Tonight is on here! Dance with me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You are just the sweetest.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I love the way you look every night Chandler! That’s why I made you this tape! Happy Birthday! Love Janice!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! You’re the sweetest!

utterance.speaker: The Instructor
utterance.content: Okay ladies, that ends today’s class, and let’s remember, let’s be safe out there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s a great class.

utterance.speaker: The Instructor
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, I was watching. Umm, hey, a couple of questions though. Umm, about that-that-that last move where the woman tripped you and then pinned you to the floor, what-what-what-what would you do next?

utterance.speaker: The Instructor
utterance.content: Well, she would take her keys and try to jam them…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. No-no. No. What would you do next?

utterance.speaker: The Instructor
utterance.content: Who? Me the attacker?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes that’s right.

utterance.speaker: The Instructor
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I tired attacking two women, did not work.

utterance.speaker: The Instructor
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I mean it’s okay, I mean, they’re-they’re my friends. In fact, I-I-I was married to one of them.

utterance.speaker: The Instructor
utterance.content: Let me get this straight man, you attacked your ex-wife?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, no! No-no! No, I tired! But I couldn’t. That’s why I’m here. Maybe we could attack them together? That-that’s a no.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am so, so, so, so sorry!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I will cook anything you want in here , and do anything in there!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah you will! And, are you kiddin’ me?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on Monica, it’s our Valentine’s Day. Please? Please-please, please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, are we going in there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I am!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah-ha, nowhere to run!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t like sitting up here! I’m just gonna over…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No Rachel! They got here first!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why is Ross doing that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: DANGER!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Why is he jumping on those women!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We should help him!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I… Well, I don’t think they need any help.
